name: Yusuf Ali
text: When the Event inevitable cometh to pass,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then will no (soul) entertain falsehood concerning its coming.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Many) will it bring low; (many) will it exalt;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When the earth shall be shaken to its depths,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the mountains shall be crumbled to atoms,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Becoming dust scattered abroad,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And ye shall be sorted out into three classes.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then (there will be) the Companions of the Right Hand;- What will be the Companions of the Right Hand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And those Foremost (in Faith) will be Foremost (in the Hereafter).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: These will be those Nearest to Allah:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In Gardens of Bliss:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A number of people from those of old,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And a few from those of later times.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (They will be) on Thrones encrusted (with gold and precious stones),

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Reclining on them, facing each other.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness),

name: Yusuf Ali
text: With goblets, (shining) beakers, and cups (filled) out of clear-flowing fountains:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: No after-ache will they receive therefrom, nor will they suffer intoxication:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And with fruits, any that they may select:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the flesh of fowls, any that they may desire.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And (there will be) Companions with beautiful, big, and lustrous eyes,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Like unto Pearls well-guarded.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A Reward for the deeds of their past (life).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not frivolity will they hear therein, nor any taint of ill,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Only the saying, "Peace! Peace".

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Companions of the Right Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Right Hand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (They will be) among Lote-trees without thorns,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Among Talh trees with flowers (or fruits) piled one above another,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In shade long-extended,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: By water flowing constantly,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And fruit in abundance.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Whose season is not limited, nor (supply) forbidden,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And on Thrones (of Dignity), raised high.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have created (their Companions) of special creation.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And made them virgin - pure (and undefiled), -

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Beloved (by nature), equal in age,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: For the Companions of the Right Hand.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A (goodly) number from those of old,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And a (goodly) number from those of later times.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Companions of the Left Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Left Hand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (They will be) in the midst of a Fierce Blast of Fire and in Boiling Water,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And in the shades of Black Smoke:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Nothing (will there be) to refresh, nor to please:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: For that they were wont to be indulged, before that, in wealth (and luxury),

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And persisted obstinately in wickedness supreme!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And they used to say, "What! when we die and become dust and bones, shall we then indeed be raised up again?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "(We) and our fathers of old?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say: "Yea, those of old and those of later times,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "All will certainly be gathered together for the meeting appointed for a Day well-known.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Then will ye truly,- O ye that go wrong, and treat (Truth) as Falsehood!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Ye will surely taste of the Tree of Zaqqum.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Then will ye fill your insides therewith,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And drink Boiling Water on top of it:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Indeed ye shall drink like diseased camels raging with thirst!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Such will be their entertainment on the Day of Requital!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It is We Who have created you: why will ye not witness the Truth?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Do ye then see?- The (human Seed) that ye throw out,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it ye who create it, or are We the Creators?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have decreed Death to be your common lot, and We are not to be frustrated

name: Yusuf Ali
text: from changing your Forms and creating you (again) in (forms) that ye know not.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And ye certainly know already the first form of creation: why then do ye not celebrate His praises?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: See ye the seed that ye sow in the ground?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it ye that cause it to grow, or are We the Cause?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Were it Our Will, We could crumble it to dry powder, and ye would be left in wonderment,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Saying), "We are indeed left with debts (for nothing):

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Indeed are we shut out (of the fruits of our labour)"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: See ye the water which ye drink?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Do ye bring it down (in rain) from the cloud or do We?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Were it Our Will, We could make it salt (and unpalatable): then why do ye not give thanks?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: See ye the Fire which ye kindle?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it ye who grow the tree which feeds the fire, or do We grow it?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have made it a memorial (of Our handiwork), and an article of comfort and convenience for the denizens of deserts.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Furthermore I call to witness the setting of the Stars,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And that is indeed a mighty adjuration if ye but knew,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: That this is indeed a qur'an Most Honourable,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In Book well-guarded,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Which none shall touch but those who are clean:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Is it such a Message that ye would hold in light esteem?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And have ye made it your livelihood that ye should declare it false?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then why do ye not (intervene) when (the soul of the dying man) reaches the throat,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And ye the while (sit) looking on,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But We are nearer to him than ye, and yet see not,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then why do ye not,- If you are exempt from (future) account,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Call back the soul, if ye are true (in the claim of independence)?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thus, then, if he be of those Nearest to Allah,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (There is for him) Rest and Satisfaction, and a Garden of Delights.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And if he be of the Companions of the Right Hand,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (For him is the salutation), "Peace be unto thee", from the Companions of the Right Hand.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And if he be of those who treat (Truth) as Falsehood, who go wrong,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: For him is Entertainment with Boiling Water.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And burning in Hell-Fire.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily, this is the Very Truth and Certainly.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme.
